channel.title: Htb-writeups on The Wolf Den
channel.description: Recent content in Htb-writeups on The Wolf Den

item.title: HTB Admirer
item.description: Admirer Admirer is a Linux box that features a vulnerable database setup and leveraging a maliciously crafted python library to achieve root. Enumeration We start off, as always, with an NMAP Scan. Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.187 Host is up (0.12s latency). Not shown: 997 closed ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 3.0.3 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.4p1 Debian 10+deb9u7 (protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 2048 4a:71:e9:21:63:69:9d:cb:dd:84:02:1a:23:97:e1:b9 (RSA) | 256 c5:95:b6:21:4d:46:a4:25:55:7a:87:3e:19:a8:e7:02 (ECDSA) |_ 256 d0:2d:dd:d0:5c:42:f8:7b:31:5a:be:57:c4:a9:a7:56 (ED25519) 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.
